more_about_me.title: More About Me
more_about_me.description: I specialise in full stack development, DevOps and cloud technologies. My expertise covers the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to systems design, including database modelling, backend API development and frontend interfaces. I also have experience in analysis and data science, as well as in setting up CI/CD pipelines and monitoring cloud infrastructures, using DevOps tools to optimise and manage cloud environments effectively.
